valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 23 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 24 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Sole 998 expected FitzRoy 1010 by 1800 Tuesday. High Norway 1034 expected Skagerrak 1038 by same time. New high expected just west of Rockall 1031 by that time
